metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7944 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in X.org libXfixes before 5.0.3 on 32-bit platforms might allow remote X servers to gain privileges via a length value of INT_MAX, which triggers the client to stop reading data and get out of sync.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxfixes3 - 1:5.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxfixes package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.0.3-1').
